body.name: G.I. Joe Classified Series General Clayton Hawk Abernathy, Collectible Action Figure, 103, 6 inch Action Figures for Boys & Girls, with 7 Accessory Pieces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 1 min
features: YO JOE! G.I. JOE EXPLODES INTO A LARGER-THAN-LIFE ERA WITH 6 INCH ACTION FIGURES: The G.I. Joe Classified Series evolves the toy figures fans know and love into a highly articulated 6-inch (150 mm) scale with premium deco and detailing

CLASSIC GENERAL CLAYTON "HAWK" ABERNATHY-INSPIRED DESIGN: Features a classic design updated to bring the G.I. Joe Commander into the modern era and 7 accessory pieces inspired by the character’s rich history

HIGHLY POSEABLE WITH PREMIUM DETAILING: G.I. Joe Classified Series General Clayton "Hawk" Abernathy action figure set features premium detailing and articulation for poseability to create dynamic dioramas (some poses may require additional support)

COLLECTIBLE PACKAGING: 103 in the G.I Joe Classified Series sequence. The closed-box packaging showcases accessory loadout, character-specific File Card Icons, original artwork, and unique digital renders that are perfect for display
EXPAND YOUR COLLECTION: Look for other G.I. Joe Figures and G.I. Joe Toys to build your roster of heroes and villains (Each sold separately. Subject to availability.)
body.description: G.I. Joe is a highly skilled special operations force of men and women from around the globe. tasked with defending the world from Cobra, a ruthless criminal organization bent on total domination. Prepared to seek out Cobra in any environment on the planet…wherever there’s trouble, G.I. Joe is there. New to the G.I. Joe Classified Series line, General Clayton "Hawk" Abernathy comes ready for adventure, with multiple points of articulation for high poseability. This General Clayton "Hawk" Abernathy figure contains 7 character-inspired accessory pieces including a helmet, 2 pairs of goggles, and 4 weapon accessories; plus a footlocker! Hawk was the original field commander of the Joe team before he got his General's star and was booted upstairs to honcho the entire G.I. Joe Operation. He's a West Point graduate and has a list of special education credits as long as his arm, but he still managed to get the main body of his experience out there where it counts—on the battle field. G.I. Joe and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The General is in the House
reviews.reviewText: One of the better and more distinct regular issue GI Joe Classified figures. he just looks great.Sculpt is amazing, with his new Bomber Jacket Torso and an excellent head sculpt. He has the Stalker hips and upper legs. But his knees and lower legs and boots might be new? The lace up boots seem higher than others in the line.Paintwork is excellent and there is plenty of it. Most distinct is his weathered leather bomber jacket, which also has individual markings for his medals and ribbons, his wings, his name plate, an American Flag on his Left shoulder and a GI Joe logo on his right. He has a removable helmet with gold star. 2 pairs of goggles with silver lenses. One for stowing on the helmet, one for wearing. His belt has some silver and gold paint work. His pants have a camo print and you can see the collar of his khaki uniform shirt with his gold generals stars beneath his jacket. Plus his delightful hair. Brown streaked with grey. A weathered warrior.Additionally he comes with 2 pistols. One in a shoulder holster one at the hip. A grenade launcher with shoulder strap, and the same shotgun Covergirl came with. Plus the 2 pairs of goggles.I would consider him a Must Have figure for GI Joe collectors. And a useful to have one for other collectors such as Marvel Legends. He's a nice well decked out General. Great for Hulk Hunting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have figure for your collection.
reviews.reviewText: A nice, detailed figure well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I salute you.
reviews.reviewText: One of the best figures and sculpts of 2023. Just enough gear. Great articulation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Little Worried About Breaking It
reviews.reviewText: I like the figure overall; and as I've stated before, I wish Hasbro would come out with the original Adventure Team in this figure; so far, only the GI Joe Club did a variation, in 3 3/4 size, and Hasbro shut them down for their own reasons, none of which had to do with quality. I used to be totally against smaller figures, since when I was a little boy I had the 1/6 scale. But in t his case, I like this 1/12 size figure.My only concern is whether the joints can hold up to bending without breaking, especially in the hands of a boy or girl too young to understand what might happen. In my case, the right arm, which has that very nice double-joint so you can bend the arm enough that it goes way beyond 90 degrees, is so stiff, I'm afraid to "flex" the elbow in fear of it snapping; not without first heating it up (either a hair blower or hot water from the tap), that may be the answer for an adult collector. Otherwise, the figure is really nice, with great detail. I really like how the box it came in has its own little cardboard "footlocker" of sorts, where you can store the figures weapons and equipment while not in use. You simply put it, as well as the "coffin-style" box the Joe is in when delivered, back inside the outer box for a convenient way to store them. The outer box has very nice graphics depicting the Joe inside, and some of his equipment and weapons. Nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The General doesn’t Disappoint
reviews.reviewText: Excellent version of the General! You want a leader, you’ve got one! This is an absolute must-have in your collection. There is no GI Joe, without a General Hawk to lead them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My son loves these! They come with very detailed accessories, for example, the weapons. Way better quality and detail than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best figure ever
reviews.reviewText: Totally impressed. Love this figure. Great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic remake of 1986 Hawk
reviews.reviewText: A sturdy figurine with great accessories. Helmet looks better on figure than when off figure. No complaints.

reviews.reviewTitle: O General Hawk não pode faltar na sua coleção.
reviews.reviewText: A figura do General Hawk ficou linda e incrível. A escultura do rosto e o detalhe grisalho no cabelo é elogiavel. As armas, apesar de já terem sido usadas em outras figuras, combinaram demais com o Hawk. O visual e roupa deixam o Hawk entre as melhores figuras da coleção até o momento. Parabéns a Hasbro pelo excelente trabalho.
Excelente figura, com articulações perfeitas, escultura muito boa. Um dos melhores Joes.
Nice addition to my collection, great detail
Estava ancioso para receber esse item, foi um de 2 Comandos em Ação que tive na infância, figura muito nostálgica pra mim
